name: Ext_R3_DataRequirement_co_valueSet
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DataRequirement|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The valueset for the code filter. The valueSet and value elements are exclusive. If valueSet is specified, the filter will return only those data items for which the value of the code-valued element specified in the path is a member of the specified valueset.
element.comment: `DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet[x]` maps to R4 `DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet`. Target added string:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The valueset for the code filter. The valueSet and value elements are exclusive. If valueSet is specified, the filter will return only those data items for which the value of the code-valued element specified in the path is a member of the specified valueset.
element.comment: `DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet[x]` maps to R4 `DataRequirement.codeFilter.valueSet`. Target added string:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
